inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of irritable bowel syndrome based on the following criteria (ROME II)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: abdominal discomfort or pain, relief with defecation, onset associated with a change in stool frequency, loose stools

inclusion.criterion: At least two of the following on at least 25% of occasions or days in the last 3 months
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: fewer than three bowel movements a week, loose (mushy) or watery stools

exclusion.criterion: History of severe or intractable IBS
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent diagnosis of any bowel disturbance that would interfere with the assessment or safety of the study
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no fever, no blood in stool

exclusion.criterion: Previous abdominal surgery (uncomplicated appendectomy, hysterectomy or cholecystectomy at least 6 months prior to entry acceptable)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of metabolic or inflammatory disease that may affect bowel motility
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no history of diabetes mellitus, sarcoidosis

exclusion.criterion: Use of the following concomitant medications: medications that can affect gastrointestinal (GI) motility
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other significant illness as determined by Investigator
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no fever, no blood in stool

notes: Patient has been experiencing dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday. He has a history of living in a camp in Sudan for a month.
